name: Fall Shapes
description:
Fall Shapes Prototype Game for NYU Game Design 2023 Minimalism Game Jam

Team: Ziynou Fleming, Dahriel Gonzalez, Anna Zheng

Try to match and collect as many falling shapes as possible! 

Friendly note: the shapes fall at different angles -- the "diamond/rhombus" is actually a square :)

Controls:

Press [SPACE] to change between Circle, Triangle, and Square shapes (in this order).

Presentation
